p: Additionally, microbial contamination is possible due to the contamination of the equipment and the environment. A microbial contamination can do damage to products (reduce shelf-life, change appearance, color, taste). Pharmaceutical forms (solid, semi-solid or liquid) are prone to microbial spoilage or degradation. Any improper packaging and consumption only increase contamination [ 25]. To protect products from contamination it is necessary to use cleaned devices and to follow good manufacturing practice rules [ 26, 27].
